title: Google\Cloud\Container\V1\MasterAuth
name: MasterAuth
description:
The authentication information for accessing the master endpoint.

Authentication can be done using HTTP basic auth or using client certificates.

Generated from protobuf message google.container.v1.MasterAuth

Extends \Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: getUsername
methods.description:
The username to use for HTTP basic authentication to the master endpoint.

For clusters v1.6.0 and later, you can disable basic authentication by providing an empty username.

Generated from protobuf field string username = 1;

methods.name: setUsername
methods.description:
The username to use for HTTP basic authentication to the master endpoint.

For clusters v1.6.0 and later, you can disable basic authentication by providing an empty username.

Generated from protobuf field string username = 1;

params.name: var
params.description:
The username to use for HTTP basic authentication to the master endpoint.

For clusters v1.6.0 and later, you can disable basic authentication by providing an empty username.

methods.name: getPassword
methods.description:
The password to use for HTTP basic authentication to the master endpoint.

Because the master endpoint is open to the Internet, you should create a strong password. If a password is provided for cluster creation, username must be non-empty.

Generated from protobuf field string password = 2;

methods.name: setPassword
methods.description:
The password to use for HTTP basic authentication to the master endpoint.

Because the master endpoint is open to the Internet, you should create a strong password. If a password is provided for cluster creation, username must be non-empty.

Generated from protobuf field string password = 2;

params.name: var
params.description:
The password to use for HTTP basic authentication to the master endpoint.

Because the master endpoint is open to the Internet, you should create a strong password. If a password is provided for cluster creation, username must be non-empty.

methods.name: getClientCertificateConfig
methods.description:
Configuration for client certificate authentication on the cluster. If no configuration is specified, a client certificate is issued.

Generated from protobuf field .google.container.v1.ClientCertificateConfig client_certificate_config = 3;

methods.name: setClientCertificateConfig
methods.description:
Configuration for client certificate authentication on the cluster. If no configuration is specified, a client certificate is issued.

Generated from protobuf field .google.container.v1.ClientCertificateConfig client_certificate_config = 3;

params.name: var
params.description: Configuration for client certificate authentication on the cluster. If no configuration is specified, a client certificate is issued.

methods.name: getClusterCaCertificate
methods.description:
[Output only] Base64-encoded public certificate that is the root of trust for the cluster.

Generated from protobuf field string cluster_ca_certificate = 100;

methods.name: setClusterCaCertificate
methods.description:
[Output only] Base64-encoded public certificate that is the root of trust for the cluster.

Generated from protobuf field string cluster_ca_certificate = 100;

params.name: var
params.description: [Output only] Base64-encoded public certificate that is the root of trust for the cluster.
